headline: Ask HN: Open Sourcing Sun Network Extensible Window System (NeWS)
description:
Kind of like HTML+CSS+JS, but PostScript from top-to-bottom.

  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NeWS
DonHopkins comments at length about it.

  https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=22455722
I wonder if there are any Oracle contacts out there who could get the ball rolling on open-sourcing this, if only for historical purposes?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 开放采购Sun网络可扩展窗口系统(NeWS)
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 開放採購Sun網絡可擴展窗口系統(NeWS)
description_zh-Hans:
Kind of like HTML+CSS+JS, but PostScript from top-to-bottom.

 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NeWS

 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=22455722
我想知道是否有任何甲骨文公司的联系人在那里，如果只是为了历史目的，他们可以把这个开源的球滚动起来？
